      • GameEngine

        public GameEngine(MapEditor p_map,
                  java.util.ArrayList<HumanPlayer> p_players)
        constructor for GameEngine
        Parameters:
        p_map - the loaded map for the game play
        p_players - the players created and added for playing

    • Method Detail

      • reinforcement

        public void reinforcement()
        based on the handout, each player gets #territories/3 (rounded down) armies. this function assign the specific number of armies based on territory to players.

      • armyAssign

        public void armyAssign()
        first the reinforcement takes place and then for each player we assign specific number of armies to each territory.

      • assignArmies

        public void assignArmies(HumanPlayer p_player)
        Assign armies to each player. asks how many armies is wanted to be deployd in each country (territory)
        Parameters:
        p_player - the player which armies are deploying in his/her territory

      • takeOrders

        public void takeOrders()
        taking the orders in a round-robin manner until all players finish their orders.

      • finish

        public boolean finish()
        if a player conquers 3/4 of all territories we declare it as Winner
        Returns:
        true if a winner is found

      • play

        public void play()
        play method for playing the game it has 3 main phases, 1 army assignment, 2 taking orders from players, 3 executing the orders

      • executeAllOrders

        public void executeAllOrders()
        execute the issued orders. checks if the player has the card for special orders show an updated version of map at the end.
